monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Anti Cascade
skills.description: Reduces enemy damage by 3% for every consecutive hit. (1st hit: 0% reduction, 2nd hit: 3% reduction, 3rd hit: 6% reduction)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Blinding Sunlight
skills.description: Every Fire and every Wind hit has a 20% chance to apply a stack of Blind. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Buff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Burning Heat
skills.description: Every Fire attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Charged Hazard
skills.description: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Burn, Poison or Shock to a random enemy.

skills.name: Charging Shield
skills.description: Shield self for 60 when receiving a Charge stack.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dodging
skills.description: Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 8%.

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Electrify
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Enlighten
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Enlighten Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Enlighten Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sorcery & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Forceful Sorcery
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sorcery also makes all attacks ignore 10% of the enemy's overall damage reduction value.

skills.name: Full Potential
skills.description: Shield target for 25% of target's Max Health Applies Might, Sorcery, Regeneration, Sidekick, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Gold Sense
skills.description: Increases Gold gained after combat by 10%. (If this Monster is participating in combat)

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Initial Shock
skills.description: Apply Shock (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Insect Charge
skills.description: Aura: All Insect Monsters in your party start combat with 8 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Conflux
skills.description: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Max Mana value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mega Restore
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (250 + 40% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Multi Shock
skills.description: Aura: Shock (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Mystify
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 50% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party starts the combat with a random Buff.

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Rejuvenate
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Rejuvenate Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Rejuvenate Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Agility & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Solar Blaze
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Solar Burst
skills.description: 1 x 170% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 105% (210%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Rays
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Thunder Strike
skills.description: 1 x 370% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 3 x 20% (60%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunder Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 460% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 4 x 20% (80%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Crystal Shard
drops.description: Teleports you back to the Keepers' Stronghold

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.
